pr_title: Publicize the APIs for JAXRS PMI/Metrics

timeline.bodyText: I think you will also need to export com.ibm.websphere.monitor.jmx - and I think both this and com.ibm.websphere.jaxrs.monitor should include ;resolution:=optional so that those packages are not required to resolve this bundle.
timeline.author: andymc12
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -17,6 +17,7 @@ Bundle-SymbolicName: com.ibm.websphere.appserver.api.jaxrs20
 
 Import-Package: com.ibm.websphere.jaxrs.providers.json4j, \
 		com.ibm.websphere.jaxrs20.multipart, \
+		com.ibm.websphere.jaxrs.monitor, \

timeline.message: Publicize the APIs for JAXRS PMI/Metrics
Publicize the APIs for JAXRS PMI/Metrics
